website_summaries.verdict: This basic smart lock did a great job in our tests, but the unexciting slate of features leaves a lot to be desired.
pros: The Kevo Convert is easy to install, and it was a steady, reliable performer in our tests
The app makes it easy to share access to the lock, including time-restricted eKeys for guests or service workers that don't cost anything extra
The retrofit design makes it a good choice for renters who aren't allowed to ditch their existing deadbolt
cons: You can't connect the Convert with a larger smart home platform like Wink or SmartThings, nor can you sync it up with Siri, Alexa or Google Assistant for voice-enabled access
The integration with IFTTT was underwhelming
And if you want to check your lock's status from beyond Bluetooth range, you'll need to spend an extra $100 on the Kevo Plus gateway device

customer_reviews.title: Kevo Convert is Technically Flawed
customer_reviews.text: It ONLY works if you give others an admin key. This is a huge technical flaw made by the Kevo team and there is not currently an ETA for when they expect to have it fixed based on my calls with them. This means that anyone who receives an admin key can give keys to anyone else. I am returning mine now, but wanted to let others know ahead of time.
customer_reviews.author: Richard

customer_reviews.title: It's junk, folks.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because I liked being able to keep my door's exterior hardware intact. I should have read the other reviews before buying. This thing is garbage. Easy enough to install, but the app continually showed the door locked when it wasn't. Every time I locked the door from my phone, the app reported that the deadbolt was jammed when it wasn't. I had it on my door for less than two hours before it went back in the box. Kwikset needs to go back and redesign this mess.
customer_reviews.author: E. Carroll

customer_reviews.title: Works sometimes. And you lock yourself out frequently
customer_reviews.text: I'm totally disappointed in the quality of your product. It shows the status at times incorrectly and it won't operate the lock when it gets into that mode. I walk to the door which is locked yet kevo concert says it is unlocked. So unlock doesn't work. So I thought fine let's lock but since it is locked it can't move the bolt so no motor operation. And it stays in this state. It really is bad I use it so infrequently because it is unreliable.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It works, but buy the full size kevo instead.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to keep the outside lock the same, and because it was slightly cheaper than the 2nd Gen Kevo lock. All I can say is that it works exactly as advertised, but I should have ponied up for the better kevo. This lock has been relegated to the back door, and I purchased another kevo lock for the front door. You have to use the app to control this lock, and I really enjoy the tap to unlock function of the other kevo. I did recently add a kevo hub, adding remote functionality to this lock... Which makes it work even better.
customer_reviews.author: Ian & Alicia

customer_reviews.title: Installation was easy, but the Bluetooth sucks
customer_reviews.text: Product stinks. Installation was easy, but the Bluetooth sucks. I had high hopes; but I've be locked out twice in the first two days of use. Each time I have to remove the cover and reboot the lock. Even when it works , you have to stand in front of your front door holding your cell phone in front of the lock for over a minute before finishes "searching" and connects...'Old fashioned" keys are easier, and I won't get rain soaked waiting to open the door. I can't be more disappointed in Kwikset. I will never buy from them again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: As pictured and described.  It works! I'm very pleased.
customer_reviews.text: I don't like carrying keys, and this allows me to lock and unlock the deadbolt on my entry door without a key. Since it converts the original lock, if it malfunctioned, I can still use my emergency key in a lock box. Installation instructions on the app were detailed and easy to follow. Installation took about 15 . Also, I have motion activated video at this door, so when someone approaches, I can unlock the door remotely. The connection to my phone works throughout our one-story home, and even on the outside deck. It is available in multiple finishes, including oil rubbed bronze, so I could match my door hardware. I'm very pleased with this device, and would recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: RMW

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Works great. I ordered one that was amazon warehouse and the items were a mess but it still Worked good. Now we moved and I wish they sold the cover separately since now we have satain nickel handles. I have emailed kwikset and they never responded. So now it sits in a box.
customer_reviews.author: jconn21074

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing performance
customer_reviews.text: I wish I would have read the reviews prior to purchase. Connection to the lock is extremely slow and you must have the app opened on your phone at all times to work reliably. Thinking it was like original Kēvo with the ability to just touch the lock for operation was my main reason for purchase, disappointed that it wasn't but thought the ability to leave the house with no keys, just my phone, would still be worth the price. Was I wrong!!! There really isn't any reason to purchase this item as the operations can be performed easier and faster by using a keypad based lock.
customer_reviews.author: Atreyu

customer_reviews.title: Trash
customer_reviews.text: This item is absolutely terrible. First it would not pair to my phone. After hours of frustration I finally got it to pair. This should have been the only clue I needed to toss this piece of trash. I installed this item so that my babysitter could access the house with my son after school. The ekeys you send to other users do not work at all. This left my sitter stranded with my son in the Arizona heat till I could get home to them. Do not waste your money. I, unfortunately, am outside my return window. I won't even post this on a 3rd party sale site. I wouldn't want anyone else to deal with this thing.
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn kohrdt

customer_reviews.title: Best door lock 🔒!!
customer_reviews.text: Product is working great I would definitely recommend these locks they are one of the best locks I have found better than any Internet lock, if your Internet goes down or if somebody breaks into your house and makes your Internet go off you would not be able to get into your door, but with this it uses Bluetooth so no Internet needed highly recommend it!!
customer_reviews.author: Casper Smith

customer_reviews.title: So far works very well.  Dead Bolt yes, I can still turn the 'key' in it to lock
customer_reviews.text: Simple unit. Works very well. Just note: The dead bolt MUST be freely operating. Freely. If for any reason there is some kind of 'binding', the lock will always act up, or not at all.
customer_reviews.author: Keer NT

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: It was not what I expected. It is very slow to respond.
customer_reviews.author: Ron

customer_reviews.title: Not compatible to all Kwikset deadbolt
customer_reviews.text: This conversion kit was a great idea but it is not compatible with all Kwikset locks. If you have the Kwikset Downtown deadbolt it would not work at all. The Downtown series has a separate torque blade for the key cylinder and handle.
customer_reviews.author: G. Lai

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Bluetooth failed, had to return it and bought Schlage Connect.
customer_reviews.author: RZ

customer_reviews.title: Even with the deadbolt working properly this product keeps showing ...
customer_reviews.text: Even with the deadbolt working properly this product keeps showing the the deadbolt is jammed. The company kept telling me that that could not be. I replaced it with the August Gen 3 BT lock works like a champ. DO NOT waste your money on the Kwickset
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: This is a good product and wad packaged well. We bought the wireless hub with it and successfully tested it from another state using the Kevo app.
customer_reviews.author: DoreenT

customer_reviews.title: Average to below average.
customer_reviews.text: I didn't care much for this lock. The Bluetooth was slow if it even worked, and I would have had to pay an extra $100 to connect it to my smart home. Install was fairly complicated as well. I exchanged it for a Schlage smart lock, which is 100x better.
customer_reviews.author: Nicolai Allman

customer_reviews.title: Nice idea, bad execution.
customer_reviews.text: This was extremely buggy, it only worked about half of the time and it was very slow. If you want to go with kevo, get the full bluetoooth. We returned this and went with a schlage smart lock instead. We love it.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Can be a little finnicky
customer_reviews.text: Mechanical installation was quite simple. Bluetooth setup also went well. WiFi setup using Kevo Plus was difficult, turns out the Kevo server is not super reliable so remote operation sometimes fails.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Unreliable, will leave you locked out!!!!!!! Thanks for nothing Kevo!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Failed on me in the middle of the night, no support availble. Massive disappointment! Stay away from this shoddy piece of trash! My Airbnb guest was locked out of the house and unable to get to their things! I'm 3000 miles away and can't do anything to rectify the situation. I should have saved my $ and hidden a spare key somewhere. Thanks for bothing Kevo!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Unreliable
customer_reviews.text: Quite complex to install. Once installed worked great for about a month then an internal issue occurred that prevented the lock from completing its cycle. Eventually deinstalled the product.
customer_reviews.author: richard fox

customer_reviews.title: Works fantastic!
customer_reviews.text: So far a great product! Installation and setup was quite easy with their instructions from the app. Even sent my friend an eKey to let himself in the house and the worked! My wife is going to be thrilled!
customer_reviews.author: Nutritionist Michael

customer_reviews.title: Love the concept
customer_reviews.text: I love the fact that you don’t need your keys, just like the car. The only problem is that it worked perfectly for the first year and then it started to have problems. Now 50% of the time I need to remove my phone from my pocket and then half the time the lock opens, the other half I need to open the app. I lived it for the first year.
customer_reviews.author: Coastal guy

customer_reviews.title: Not a good solution
customer_reviews.text: Returned this product after hours, literally hours, on the phone with technical support. Really wanted this to work.
customer_reviews.author: Lane M.

customer_reviews.title: Least intuitive lock I’ve ever seen.
customer_reviews.text: This ended up being a super disappointing lock. Extremely slow. Even with the Kēvo Plus it’s terrible. 100% not worth the money. Spend more and get a higher quality product.
customer_reviews.author: Nick Kagy

customer_reviews.title: It was easy to install but it takes forever to unlock and ...
customer_reviews.text: It was easy to install but it takes forever to unlock and lock. Way faster to use a key. It doesn’t connect half the time and I have found it says my door is locked but in reality it is not. Unless you are home and always have a Bluetooth connection it takes forever to find. It’s faster to just reboot the program or use a key. Don’t waist your money.
customer_reviews.author: Jon Stanford

customer_reviews.title: Wish it would have been better
customer_reviews.text: Purchased product in July now the lock is.t not functioning properly. It shows locked it is not locking and the lock sticks at time. Removed lock and still sticks.
customer_reviews.author: Mario Martinez

customer_reviews.title: Not plug and play.
customer_reviews.text: Worked ok after install and set up which took some time.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher

customer_reviews.title: TOO SLOW, Doesn't work like it should
customer_reviews.text: Lock is too slow for connection and fails to connect to son's Iphone. Works with the Galaxy 6 & 7 models but will take up to 2 minutes to connect and unlock. Great idea but doesn't function as expected.
customer_reviews.author: Luther A.

customer_reviews.title: Do not waste your time or money
customer_reviews.text: This product does not work consistently. We have contacted customer service a number of times and it still does not work properly. I installed this as a key alternative and if I only relied on this I would have been locked out a number of times. Do not waste your time or money.
customer_reviews.author: alan dubrow

customer_reviews.title: Not work as easily as advertised.
customer_reviews.text: Takes long time to open & close lock with smart phone. Must be touching lock.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Kevo
customer_reviews.text: If your door frame is not absolutely, positively, PERFECT DO NOT buy this product what a RIP off and my house is 2 yrs OLD go figure.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Didn't work. Went with another product (August) and it worked flawlessly!
customer_reviews.author: LTee

customer_reviews.title: Scam on the price , the wifi part is more than lock
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put together. But needs other parts to make it wifi, and other part cost more than the lock itself.
customer_reviews.author: James Matthews

customer_reviews.title: Not so great.
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't work very well. Range is poor. App is clunky. For Airbnb applications, I would just use a keypad and be done with it.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan Sory

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: It works very well with I phone but takes too long to connect with Samsung Galaxy
customer_reviews.author: FAROOQ

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: Works as intended. I wish I could add the keypad instead of buying a set of lock/keypad
customer_reviews.author: Jimmy

customer_reviews.title: Nice way to make your existing deadbolt smart.
customer_reviews.text: I just love the ease of installation of this lock!
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Frazier

customer_reviews.title: refund status
customer_reviews.text: Product is junk buy the whole lock not this one. Will not connect to existing latch no matter which insert is used.
customer_reviews.author: Val S.

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Needs to be close to the lock for it to operate.
customer_reviews.author: gene mendoza

customer_reviews.title: Would be a 5 if I didn't have to pay for an upgrade.
customer_reviews.text: This works great, but takes too long to connect. Also, I hate that you have to buy a $99 upgrade to use from anywhere
customer_reviews.author: Shane

customer_reviews.title: Bummer and expensive.
customer_reviews.text: Having issues. Slow connect if it connect. Not cool. Also it isnt updating software.
customer_reviews.author: brad

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't say that it requires a Smart Hub but it does require about a $200 Kevo hub.
customer_reviews.author: Seattledunlop

customer_reviews.title: Not meeting expectations
customer_reviews.text: Early impressions on the convert are not favorable...had issues pairing the lock with my phone and once I was able to successfully connect, the lock would drop off and not lock/unlock via the app. Have a message into Kēvo customer service (who didn't have Sunday hours?). Hope this can be corrected but as of now, this item is well below expectations for a lock at this price point.
customer_reviews.author: J. Pekala

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: I haven't program it, but I'm looking forward to it. Its pleasure to make it.
customer_reviews.author: James Currieo

product_meta.title: Kwikset 99250-103 Convert Bluetooth Enabled Smart Lock Conversion Kit for Interior Electronic Deadbolt Replacement, Works with Alexa via (Hub and Kevo Plus Not Included), Venetian Bronze
product_meta.description:
Color Name:Venetian BronzeTransform your existing deadbolt into a smart lock with Kevo Convert. Keep your existing deadbolt and make it smarter in a matter of minutes. Kevo Convert was made to protect your world from the inside out, with the latest security technology. The Venetian Bronze finish is hand-rubbed to reveal unique bronze highlights and provides a rich and warm complement to the product's style. 
Kevo Convert now works with Alexa voice commands (requires Kevo Plus hub, sold separately). You can lock/unlock (PIN required) and check lock status. 
Compatible Door Locks: 
Standard deadbolts are compatible. 
If you have a standard deadbolt mounted separately from the handle below it, it is compatible with Kevo Convert. 
Kevo convert is compatible with Kwikset, Weiser, Baldwin Prestige, Baldwin Reserve, Baldwin Estate, and Schlage standard deadbolts. 
Android Compatibility*:
Pixel, Pixel XL, Nexus 5X,6, 6P,9, HTC One M9 Samsung Galaxy S5, S5 Active, S6, S6 Active, S6 Edge, S7, S7 Active, S7 Edge, Note 4, Note 4 Edge, Note 5 Android Wear Devices
Apple iOS Compatibility: 
iPhone 4s, 5, 5s, 6, 6 Plus, 6s, 6s Plus, SE, 7, 7 Plus iPad 3rd Gen, iPad 4th Gen, Air, Air 2, Pro (12.9-inch), Pro (9.7 inch), iPad Mini, Mini 2, Mini 3, Mini 4 Pod Touch 5th Gen, 5th Gen (16GB Mid 2013), 6th Gen Apple Watch - notifications only. 
*Kwikset is working diligently to add new Android device compatibility to Kevo. Each device is put through a rigorous security and user experience test to ensure that our users have the most secure and best possible experience with Kevo. 
Kwikset is pleased to announce that Kevo eKeys will be completely free of charge starting February 1, 2017.
feature_bullets: Kevo Convert upgrades your existing Kwikset, Weiser, Baldwin or Schlage deadbolt into a smart lock that you can lock/unlock within Bluetooth range using your smart device (check device compatibility below before purchase)
Use with Kevo Plus Connected Hub to remotely lock or unlock your door from anywhere (sold separately for $99)
Kevo Convert now works with Alexa voice commands (requires Kevo Plus Connected Hub)
Not Touch-to-Open – you will need a Kevo 2 (99250-203) Smart Lock
Smart Home compatibility with Amazon Alexa, Ring Doorbell, Skybell, Nest Learning Thermostat, select Honeywell Thermostats, Android Wear and IFTTT

Download the Kevo app to lock or unlock your door, send digital eKeys, and track home access from your compatible iOS or Android smartphone (check list of compatible smartphones, below, before purchase)
Kevo Convert features an optional auto lock that will lock your door 30 seconds after unlocking for safety and peace of mind
Please see Installation Manual and Compatibility PDF (titled User Manual) under Technical Specification section for additional information
Use your phone to lock/unlock your Kevo Convert within Bluetooth range, or utilize a Kevo Plus hub to remotely lock or unlock your door from anywhere (sold separately for $99 via Kevo App)
Please see Installation Manual and Compatibility PDF (titled User Manual) under Technical Specification section for additional information
Smart Home compatibility with Amazon Alexa, Ring Doorbell, Skybell, Nest Learning Thermostat, select Honeywell Thermostats, Android Wear and IFTTT

specifications.Installation Method: Easily installs in minutes with just a screwdriver
specifications.Included Components: Kevo Convert Interior Assembly, 4 AA Rayovac batteries, Baldwin conversion hardware, Setup Guide, Kwikset conversion hardware, Schlage conversion hardware
specifications.Warranty Description: Lifetime mechanical and finish warranty, 1 year electronics warranty
specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.1 out of 5 stars142 ratings3.1 out of 5 stars
